{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3557842,"name":"ahuang","username":"ahuang","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/13edae/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-15T21:15:35.611Z","cooked":"

Hello, our team is in competition and is running into this problem for the first time.

Whenever we try to reset the gyro with a button, instead, this makes the robot immovable.

We have the same exact code as last season’s, but for some reason, our code is failing this seasons. Our code is not giving us any errors to work with.

Here is our code:

def zeroHeading(self):
        self.gyro.reset()

  def configureButtonBindings(self):
        commands2.button.JoystickButton(self.driverController, wpilib.XboxController.Button.kStart).onTrue(InstantCommand(lambda: self.swerve.zeroHeading()))

self.gyro = wpilib.ADXRS450_Gyro()

Any help would be appreciated!

We found the solution! The code for the navx changed from 2024 to 2025, where it doesn’t take the type we passed in to the gyro from last season.
